subsidy.translation[0].definitions[0].de: money that is paid by a government or organization to make prices lower, reduce the cost of producing goods etc
subsidy.translation[1].definitions[0].de: money that is paid by a government or organization to make something such as a particular food or product cheaper to buy, use, or produce
subsidy.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Billions of dollars were given out in agricultural subsidies.
